com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenControlBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpenControlList, SpenControlStroke

    public abstract class SpenControlBase
extends View
    Control Base is a common control class for the object which been selected. It provides the basic methods for retrieving or modifying object and object property. (i.e., object border drawing, Rect information, object style, MotionEvent, etc.) The control could be easily retrieved from CanvasView.getControl(), the getObjectList() methods, return a list of objects (which are defined as SpenObjectBase).
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Field Detail

      • STYLE_BORDER_OBJECT

        public static final int STYLE_BORDER_OBJECT
        Define the style of object border. the definition will drawing border depends on object attribute, if object is rotatable and resizable, then dashed line border, eight touching point and rotation knob are drawn and resizing and if object is only resizable, then dashed line border, eight touching point are drawn. If the object is not rotatable and not resizable, then only line border is drawn.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STYLE_BORDER_NONE

        public static final int STYLE_BORDER_NONE
        Define the style of object border. If this style is set, then border is not drawn and resizing and rotating are not available.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STYLE_BORDER_STATIC

        public static final int STYLE_BORDER_STATIC
        Define the style of object border. If this style is set, then only line border is drawn and resizing and rotating are not available.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STYLE_BORDER_NONE_ACTION_NONE

        public static final int STYLE_BORDER_NONE_ACTION_NONE
        Define the style of object border. If this style is set, then only line border is drawn and resizing and rotating are not available, and no action is available like move.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • isTouchEnabled

        public boolean isTouchEnabled()
        Check if touch event handling is enabled.
        Returns:
        true - control handles touch event.
        false - control ignores and passes touch event to the behind window.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:

      • setTouchEnabled

        Enable or disable touch event handling.
        Parameters:

        Since:

        See Also:
        isTouchEnabled()

      • setMinResizeRect

        public void setMinResizeRect(RectF rect)
        Set the specified area as the minimum resize area. Size of mininum rect must be less than the current size of object.
        Parameters:
        rect - The minimum resize area.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if rect is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setDimEnabled

        public void setDimEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable dimming for the control.
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to dim everything behind this control, set to false to ensure that the screen does not change anything.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        isDimEnabled()

      • getPixel

        public int getPixel(int x,
                    int y)
        Get the color at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        x - The original raw X coordinate.
        y - The original raw Y coordinate.
        Returns:
        The color at the specified coordinate. This method returns 0 if x or y is out of the bound (negative or greater than the width or height respectively). The returned color is a non-blended ARGB value.
        Since:
        3.0.0
